abilities.description: When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3ff03b51f620ab26]{Undertake an Expedition} through uncharted or unfamiliar overland territory, you may reroll one challenge die.

When you find or make shelter in the wilds, roll +wits. On a strong hit, you and your allies envision how you pass the time and each take +2 spirit or +2 health, or +1 to each. In addition, any companions in your company take +1 health. On a weak hit, the comfort is fleeting; you and your allies take +1 health or +1 spirit. On a miss, you encounter hardship or a new danger; @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.703964b8d02355b8]{Resupply} by searching out a source of food, water, or other natural resources in the wilds, add +1. On a strong hit with a match, you encounter an unusual or extraordinary location; you may @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.367804b98f30d5f4]{Explore a Waypoint} (even if not on an expedition) and reroll any dice.
